TopicTitle: A very special Kerbal takes a photo

Articles.Content:
Here is a short clip from the 45 minute film my team and I are making! 

[http://nassault.com/](http://nassault.com/)

 Sorry for the delay everyone, but as promised the film is coming to Youtube during an August near you. Working away from home for two months. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) But can't wait to get back and finish this, as well as begin making some more fun films.

![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)! I..jjjus.t can.t eeeevennn! That is awsome!!! I want it now

![giphy.gif](http://media.giphy.com/media/vO8F4fYQd39h6/giphy.gif)

(On a more serious note that is amazing.it looks really well made good job!) 

Now shut up and take my rep!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-05T12:54:01Z" title="07/05/2015 12:54  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 5, 2015</time> by technicalfool**
  
Don't make it obvious, eh?

\*GASP\*

Progress I see! I've been waiting for *Voyager* to get out since it was announced! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

ALL HAIL NASSAULT

That man, is aweosme.
Very much looking forward to this!
